front.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Information Technology - Telecommunications and information exchange between systems - Wireless Regional Area Networks (WRAN) - Specific requirements - Part 22.2: Recommended Practice for the Installation and Deployment of IEEE 802.22 Systems

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This document recommends best engineering practices 1 for the installation and deployment of IEEE 802.22 systems to help assure that such systems are correctly installed and deployed
